name: The Treasure of Neverland
description: In this visual novel set in the magical world of Neverland, Peter Pan and the Lost Boys embark on a quest to discover a treasure hidden deep within the island.

name: You Are the Inch Valley Captive
description: "You Are the Inch Valley Captive" is a single-player Quake map, designed as an adventure where the player will tumble through the dangers of multiple dungeons in a non-linear quest to escape the Inch Valley.

name: Let's Watch Steamboat Willie
description:
Two film nerds sit down for a comfy evening watching old movies. Next up is Steamboat Willie, and they quickly take to bickering.
By the time the cartoon is over, one of them will be dead.

name: Killer Chat
description: Killer Chat is a dark satire romance chatsim where you date serial killers. Pretend to be a serial killer, get inspiration for your book, fall in love, and try not to call the cops through a whirlwind six months with your murderous beau of choice. Who knows? You might find your happily ever after... or headline the news as a gruesomely lovesick corpse. It's honestly up to you.

name: Bathday
description: Bathday is a short horror game in which you will find yourself in a public shower room. All you need to do is shower and go home after a hard day's work. But, while taking a shower, you ever have any thoughts of “Do I really exist?” or “What if, when I close my eyes, the world disappears?”...

name: La Ruota Della Sfortuna: Prima parte
description:
"You've received a strange message (an MMS... yes, you read that right) from your uncle, and you've just arrived at his house to find out what happened.

Strangely, all the lights are off, and the front door is open.

The situation worries you a bit, but you gather your courage—your uncle might be in danger.

You turn on your phone's flashlight and step inside..."

"La Ruota Della Sfortuna - Prima parte" is the first part of the game. It was created to participate in the ITALOCURSO Game Jam 2024."

name: Blessed Curse
description: Blessed Curse is a 4-player, online co-op, psychological horror game. Take on a rumor you've received of a haunted location in Japan. At the scene utilize your entity-hunting equipment to gather evidence and figure out what might be residing there.

name: Egg Squeeze
description: Egg Squeeze is a biological intuition test where you squeeze eggs for as long as you can without breaking them.

name: Last Mind Standing
description: When you need answers, you ask questions. When you don't get them, there is always another way, although it won't be easy. Put the helmet on, lay down, close your eyes, take a deep breath and relax. In a few moments, nightmares will get real.

name: Invasion of The Halloween Fiends
description: Invasion of The Halloween Fiends is a First-Person Retro horror game that takes place on Halloween Night. Strangers keep visiting you looking for candy. Some of them may not be so friendly. Will you be able to survive Halloween Night?

name: President 47
description: The republic is under attack, but the enemies of freedom are on the run. We've got them right where we want them, folks, as their schemes unravel and their plots are exposed for the whole world to see. We need you to help the 47th president to restore order. Stay vigilant, complete the journey.

name: Nuclear Lizard Island Rampage
description: Play as an enraged kaiju and defend your home against industrialists stripping it of its resources.

name: Riddle Tower: Halloween DLC
description: Monkid is here to celebrate Halloween with a DLC featuring 25 new spooky-themed levels. Follow his journey to the spooky castle and test your brain in these fresh adventures.

name: Hot And Lovely Waifu XXII
description: This game is a classic elimination game, full of fun and challenges！ Quickly swap the positions of various cute icons on the board, and the same ones will be eliminated. Each level has different requirements, so let them eliminate more~

name: Boxcars
description: Free and open source online backgammon.

name: Gravity Up
description: Gravity UP

name: Time's Prison
description: A pirate who is burning with love for treasure finally finds the treasure island on the map. However, the pirate has puzzles to solve and adventures to go through. The story of the game starts right here.

name: My Monster
description: An adults-only visual novel about Samuel Hart, an anxious man finally making the big leap: moving in with his soon-to-be-not-so-long-distance-anymore boyfriend—the big and friendly Sullivan, a monster who wears his heart on his sleeve. With Samuel settling in, and Sullivan off work for a few days, the two make the most out of their first few days of cohabitation. Follow the couple as they hit up the town, go shopping, visit the city, relax under the stars, and more!

name: Blood: What Lies Beneath
description: Follow Caleb who is lost at sea to a mysterious island. What will he discover beneath the surface, in the bowels of the island? A dark cult has taken over a mansion, its surroundings and the secrets beneath the reef. This is a non-linear addon for Blood. Fight the way you want, choose your own path through the island and find places otherwise kept a secret. Find clues to progress with tomes around the island

name: Mint's Hints
description: Mint's Hints is a cancelled children's show, and you've found yourself on the old set. Find paw-shaped Hints with special ghost-detecting Flashbrights, and discover the secret behind the show's closure with your Happy-Go-Lucky Notebook, but be careful, the stars of the show are after you.

name: The Last Drop
description: The Last Drop is a pixel art top-down shooter where you control the last water droplet on Earth. Battle waves of enemies with unique weapons, customize the map, and compete on the online leaderboard.

name: Ballads of Hongye Reborn
description: Sin descripción

name: Survival Float Simulator: Crocodile Waters Craft, Raft, Build
description: Survive on the Raft Conquer the Swamp, Beware the Crocodile

name: Janosik 2: Prologue
description:
Pick up the mantle of the plucky maiden getting ready for her date night that is unceremoniously interrupted by the dastardly duo of Countess Bathory and Baron de Blonde in this prologue to the colourful Janosik 2 retro action-platformer…

Janosik 2: Prologue is an introduction to "Janosik 2", presenting a separate story that takes place right before the events of the main game.

name: Pollution
description: This game is a pixelated adventure set in a vast, open world where players pilot a plane using the ASDW keys for movement and the left mouse button to attack.

name: Rampage Rowing
description: This game is a thrilling racing adventure that pits four characters against each other in a fast-paced competition.

name: Restock
description: This game is a dazzling puzzle adventure that invites players into a world of colorful, sparkling diamonds. The objective is simple yet addictive: swap adjacent gems to create sets of three or more of the same color, which then vanish, earning points.

name: Just Another Platformer
description: It's a challenging 2D platformer from an indie studio, where you must climb a treacherous tower to save your mother's life from a deadly illness.

name: Emergency Call 112: The Fire Fighting Simulation 2 - The Swap Body Vehicle
description:
The add-on ‘WLF - Swap body vehicle’ is the second expansion for Emergency Call 112 - The Fire Fighting Simulation 2 and adds the eponymous vehicle to the player's vehicle fleet.
Different roll-off containers can be attached and transported with the swap body vehicle. This allows additional equipment and material to be brought to the scene.

name: Endoparasitic 2
description: Three limbs ripped off, infected with a deadly parasite, you must survive. Drag yourself through the hallways of an infested arcship, fight off twisted eldritch creatures, craft vaccines and ammunition, and escape to civilization.

name: Tarisland: Season 1 - Blight Dragon Elegy
description: Sin descripción

name: Dave the Diver: Mxmtoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Dave the Diver: Balatro
description: Sin descripción

name: Dave the Diver: Potion Craft
description: Sin descripción

name: Prenup Struggles
description:
Prenup Struggles is the game that is about the story of a young man from Buriram who wants to marry a woman, yet he wasn't able to do that because of the high prenup from the woman's father.

The young has no choice, but to move to the new city to fulfill his dream

Or not?

name: Daemonologie
description: A remake of the short folk horror story about the Scottish witch trials in Unreal Engine 5. You play the role of a witchfinder. Speak to the locals and sort their truths from their lies. On the last morning a witch must hang, best you know who by then.

name: Aim Camp
description: Aim Camp is the new tool to improve your aiming and precision skills. It combines military simulation with the fun of gaming. Face intense challenges with realistic graphics and comprehensive training, including CQB, sniping, and drones. Get ready to dominate every shooter game!

name: Noircotics
description: All drugs are legal in the city. Your job is to manipulate them to keep up with the demands of the mobs.

name: Sim Solver
description: With the help of a companion, the program charged with running these simulations. You'll debug viruses by solving puzzles, shooting your way through hostile code, platforming around any number of obstacles, and exploring areas for key items that take you deeper into the simulation!

name: Cat Journey
description: Cat Journey is a third person game that explores an underground city with a cat as the protagonist. There are many robot residents here, and it is necessary to find a way to communicate and understand the city with them.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 14: Queen Dizzy
description: Adds Queen Dizzy to the roster of playable characters

name: Sword Art Online: Fractured Daydream - Premium Edition
description: The Premium Edition includes SWORD ART ONLINE Fractured Daydream, Character Pass Vol.1, Prism Heart Costume Set, Digital Artbook & Soundtrack App, and Wild Joker Dress.

name: Sword Art Online: Fractured Daydream - Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes SWORD ART ONLINE Fractured Daydream, Character Pass Vol.1, and the Prism Heart Costume Set.

name: Space Marine VR - Defenders of Avarax
description: From the Warhammer 40,000 universe, the hotly anticipated Space Marine VR: Defenders of Avarax is coming to Zero Latency VR venues globally. Available in October 2024.

name: Little Brats!
description: A playground simulator

name: Nbb.Exe
description: NBB.EXE is a challenging fast paced puzzle platformer. Bomb your way to victory through devious gauntlets and reveal the secrets of the mysterious NEON corp. in a modern reimagining of Bomberman with a metroidvania twist.

name: Moving Houses
description: A silly little physics-based game about moving on.

name: The Heirloom
description: The Heirloom is a 2D single player mysterious thriller adventure with puzzle elements inspired by the atmosphere of the Hebrides and Scottish folklore, where players are given the opportunity to make fateful decisions while navigating through a story full of secrets and mysteries.

name: Ultimate Armored Turbodrifter: Saga Chapter 2 - Tank Authority Wolfram
description: Take control of a powerful drone tank meant for drifting and destroying cars! Destroy cars, earn your wage. WARNING: [Drinking hydraulic fluid will make you poop smoother]

name: The Rise
description: Help Sam and Elicy on their challenging journey through the abyss. An epic 2D precision platform game where exploring the unknown, overcoming obstacles, and discovering secrets are crucial to reaching the top of the abyss. Adventure awaits you!

name: Sail of Dreams
description: Sail the sea and pilot your own ship to battle various vessels in quest of gold and glory! Upgrade your cannons, add a piercing prow to the bow, or recruit small cats to help you crew your ship! Find the true goal of a child's mind wandering his own dreams.

name: Little Survivors
description: Little Survivors is a short and accessible action rogue-lite, with an emphasis on simple but satisfying combat against monsters. Enter comic books, free animals, then use them to attack the vile Glurks!

name: Sailaway III
description: Sailing simulation. Explore the world's oceans or compete in races in the most realistic sailing simulator available. The sailing waters are as big as the real world and circumnavigation will take several months. True weather, true conditions and true sail trim.

name: Cozy Keep: Farm, Craft, Manage
description: Experience the daily life of a shopkeeper! Clean and decorate the place, pay taxes, gather resources and craft products that can be sold for maximum profits! Explore the world, hunt, and cultivate the land! Own the best shop in the region and save your father from the wrath of the King!

name: EcoGnomix
description: A quirky mix of roguelite and city builder. Build a lively little city above, by looting mystical caves with a team of gnomes below! Use multiple runs to unlock upgrades and abilities to help your gnomes venture deeper into the dangerous underground.

name: Dread Dawn
description: This is an open world Zombie Survival game, The location of the game is set in the city. You are forced to stay in the city because you can't catch up with the evacuation team. You need to defend the camp with other survivors who stay in the city and survive.

name: Deeper
description: Deeper is a choice-driven Adult Visual Novel. In Deeper you play as Jake and guide him through life making decisions which will surely impact the world around him and his relationships with each character.

name: Beware the Ghost
description: A spooky party game about haunting your friends.

name: Bubblegum Zombie Hunter
description: Twin Stick arcade shooter halloween fun! Fast paced 8 directional shooting for a retro experience, complete with Halloween vibes and fun challenges. Blast your way through 10 levels playing as Kaylee Bu33le, utilize power ups and your reflexes to overcome the zombie hordes.

name: Ship of Theseus
description: Ship of Theseus is an intense Sci-Fi shooter with an in-depth story. An atmospheric single-player campaign is accompanied by a fully featured co-op multiplayer, where cooperation is as important as your own skills.

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Legacy of Kain Collection
description: Master vampiric powers as Kain in Blood Omen: Legacy of Kain, and stalk the shadows as Raziel in Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver.

name: MadFut 25
description: MADFUT 25 is the 24/25 season version of this popular football card game. In this version, you will find many new features that will allow you to enjoy fun games where you will try to unlock the best football player cards.

name: Bad Manors
description: On Friday the 13th, your plans for a spooky Halloween night are dashed when you show up alone at the escape room reserved by your friend. You consider going home when a handsome stranger offers to accompany you. Maybe the night is saved after all… Or so you thought.

name: Breaker Initiating
description: BREAKER: INITIATING is a short 3D game featuring platforming and puzzle-solving elements. You step into the role of El, a robot equipped with electrical discharge abilities. Navigate through a desolate world, using El's unique powers to overcome obstacles and explore mysterious environments.

name: The Bitmap Brothers Collection 2
description: The Bitmap Brothers Collection 2 for Evercade brings together five home computer classics from the self-appointed “rock stars” of the British game development scene, including Cadaver and its expansion The Payoff, Gods, Magic Pockets and The Chaos Engine 2, plus the 32-bit home console version of real-time strategy classic Z!

name: Hentai Girls: Ultra Complete
description: Sin descripción

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Ultra Legendary
description: Sin descripción

name: Pippa and Your Phantasmal Problem
description:
Ms Ester's beautiful and neat house has been mysteriously wrecked in the past few weeks and nobody knows why. Patches of dirt on the carpet, things gone missing, and all sorts of mess keeps happening around the house. The police was called to investigate, a priest was invited to bless the house, and a group of ghostbusters was hired (they were so expensive!) and none of them found anything. How useless!

If this problem isn't solved by the time Ms Ester returns from her short trip, she'll kick you out. You have to find someone who can help: anyone will do, even this unreliable looking, self-proclaimed witch you just randomly met.

name: Spirit Driver
description: From the everyday passenger to the horrors of Halloween, Spirit Driver is a short, casual conversation simulator where your choices can affect the fates of people and spirits alike. Remember, your choices have consequences. Good luck!

name: Multiverse Loot Hunter: Three Kingdoms
description: This is a brush treasure adventure game across the heavens. The protagonist awakens his powers and freely passes through different planes such as Xiuxian, history, Wuxia, magic, and future. Collect equipment, spirits, characters and cheats distributed across all planes through battle.

name: Grisù Tales from Dragontown
description: Discover "Grisù Tales from Dragontown", the PC game for children that brings the adventures of Grisù from the TV series into your living room! With 4 intuitive challenges (Racing, Photoshooting, Recovery, Exploration) and original scenes, experience the emotions of Dragontown. Fun guaranteed!

name: Lunchy
description: You find yourself conveniently in the Lunchy factory after closing, your stomach rumbles, you're hungry. Your tasked to craft your own Lunchy meal to satisfy your hunger and escape.

name: Exclusive Memory
description: Three Days of Crisis: Exclusive Memories "is a suspenseful love story full dynamic live action interactive video game. The whole game is a process of exploration and puzzle solving, in which you will delve into a complex and mysterious story. Collect clues through interactions with different characters, solve puzzles, and gradually uncover the truth hidden behind them

name: Oto-hime
description: Shimako, a socially anxious office worker, escapes the pressures of her company's beach retreat by fishing alone, only to stumble upon a trapped turtle by the shore. When she rescues it, Shimako is mysteriously whisked away to a hidden underwater palace, where she meets Oto-hime, a breathtakingly beautiful but enigmatic princess. Drawn in by Oto-hime's charm and her lavish hospitality, Shimako soon realizes there is something unsettling beneath the princess's kind façade.

name: Tekken 8: Genmaji Temple
description:
Genmaji Temple, where mysterious ascetic monks train themselves in blood-soaked drills in a secluded area deep in the mountains, is now available!

The scenery changes depending on the time of day. The daytime atmosphere is solemn, the evening is filled with dancing autumn leaves, and the night is filled with falling snow.

name: On Wings Bringing Sleep
description: 'On Wings Bringing Sleep' is the story of Morgaine, an outcast among the fae as her people's power is ever-dwindled by the advance of human technology. When she meets a mysterious and enthralling human girl within the forest one day, Morgaine grows certain that this girl is in need of her magical protection. But Ilse has secrets of her own, and the growing feelings between them may cost more than either girl might ever pay...

name: The Genie of the Wonderful Lamp
description: The story focuses on the further adventures of Aladdin, the young adventurer from Agrabah, after his first encounter with the magic lamp.

name: Tiny Cafe
description:
Run your own cafe for free!
Open and run a cafe with Dolce, the world's smallest barista mouse, and the cat Gusto.
Brew drip coffee with beans from Gusto's own roastery.
The aromatic smell of coffee will attract cats to your cafe.

name: Play of Wire
description: Within the brain of "Funblood", you are a "Funblood" who has become severed. So of course, you have to get up now!

name: Murder Mystery Mayhem AI
description: Find the murderer in this AI-powered 1920s whodunit. Interrogate suspects with rich personalities and piece together clues in procedurally generated cases. Experience infinite replayability as you roleplay a detective in this unique blend of deduction, strategy, and AI-driven storytelling.

name: Not My Part
description: This is story about 'Grace' who is on her way to the Sunday Lake camp, but something happens that makes her meet a famous serial killer at a motel along the way. In this horror movie-like scenario, what role will she play?

name: Upwards, Rain! The Post Office of Farewells
description: On the outskirts of a small village stands a massive tree whose canopy disappears far above the clouds. While grandiose on the outside, its interior houses the humble Mortem Post, which receives and delivers letters from those who have passed on. Deciding to break protocol to lend a helping wing, Rain, a flighty little courier takes a skittish girl by the name of Mila on an adventure through the inner workings of the post office. Together, they search for a letter containing the last words of someone who seemingly never existed.

name: Star Word
description: A mysterious earthquake shatters the two protagonists' final day on an alien planet. Help them escape using a Scrabble-like method of communication!

name: Home is Where the Heart is
description:
'Home is Where the Heart is' (HiWtHi) is a survival horror visual novel in which the choices you make determine the fates of the three love interests.

You play as Doe (name and pronouns customisable), a person who has been trapped in this house for longer than you can remember. It's only when three uninvited guests arrive do you see your first hope of escape. But, whoever trapped you here doesn't treat your newfound friends as kindly as they do you.

Will you do all you can to help any of the LIs survive until the end? Or will you be the one to sabotage them, taking the side of your mysterious captor... who may be closer than you think?

name: Nine To Five (am)
description:
You know what’s worse than death? Working minimum wage.

A silly game about the horrors of working as a convenience store clerk.

The Boss wants YOU to cover your friend’s shift for a week. Help the customer with everything they need, or not! We don’t really care! Chatting with clients may be nice though.

name: Luka Tim Incident
description: 3D Twitch meme themed horror game.

name: Tell It Slant
description:
Caught between a forgotten friend and unseen threats, you must find the angle where the lies you’re told start to reflect the truth.
But do not fear. If you fail, we can start again from the beginning.

Tell It Slant is an intimate and layered parable exploring friendship, grief, and what is left behind when power is traded for belonging.

name: Lydia's Labyrinth
description:
Lydia's Labyrinth is a "choose your own adventure" style visual novel, inspired by the classic old school game books such as the 'Fighting Fantasy' series.

Embark upon an odyssey through the Vampress' lair, seeking freedom, fortune, love, vengeance or even clues to your own origins!

name: Post Memory
description: You are a postman in a remote town. Slowly uncover the secrets that lies underneath the surface... or don't. The choice is in your hands.

name: Get Baz Home
description: Bizzare retro platformer featuring warped level design

name: Märchen Line
description:
Embrace the indomitable human spirit by serving in the First Among Father's Voyager Armada- The Bravest of The Brave, who venture out to liberate the Milky Way from the True Enemy.

Serving as a Soldier means embracing infinite potential. With the blessing of His Runes, you will grow stronger, smarter, faster and braver in a few weeks than you have in your entire life. All that growth comes with responsibility, and you will be expected to pay your civic dues- but luckily each Soldier is assigned a Valkyrie to help them manage their priorities.

Train your stats, build your relationships, and be all you can be...or push past the galactic narrative and seek a deeper understanding of humanity's true ranking in the galactic hierarchy.

name: SpellForce: Conquest of Eo - Weaver's Realms
description: The Weaver’s Realms DLC introduces endless worlds that can be created with a simple click – your game will never be the same again.

name: Witch You Want
description:
With an oddly sparkly magical paper, you look over the job listing for a local witch needing an assistant with making potions before the town festival that weekend. Something so short notice would surely be hard for her to find workers, and you just happen to be inbetween jobs—so you sign up, unsure exactly what to expect......

A pompous and questionably excellent witch runs a local apothecary in town but finds that if she wants to make enough potions before the festival that weekend to sell (and keep her ongoing potion shop afloat) she'll need some assistance. After a dubious help wanted ad, she gains you as an assistant. Will the two of you see through to the festival? Will you be able to make a single potion? Will this girlfailure capture your heart?!

name: Yuri Paddle: An Anime Convention Murder Mystery
description: Onkai Expo is on fire. As the guest coordinator of a smalltime anime convention with big problems, it's up to the underpaid and overburdened Stella to solve the murder of a famous cosplayer.

name: 100 Hiddensaurs: Greece
description:
Dinosaurs escaped to Ancient Greece. Try to find them all. And get a mini-game.
By purchasing DLC, you will get a new level in the game 100 Hiddensaurs.

DLC INCLUDE:
New level
New mini game

name: Sleepwalking
description: Sleepwalking is a snowy adventure across 3 MBF21 maps that exists because Ravendesk made a few midis and wanted to make maps to accompany them. UV is designed to be somewhat challenging, but fair (think mid Valiant to mid Sunlust difficulty-wise). HMP should be very accessible to most players, while HNTR is a walk in the park for those who just want to enjoy a snowy landscape. Whichever difficulty you choose, expect to receive a buffed weapon roster that should help you to deal with the opposing monster forces.

name: Blue Light
description: Blue Light is a horror adventure game set in the year 2029. The main character goes in search of his missing sister, exploring the most dangerous and paranormal places in the city.

name: Calm Skies
description: Experience the thrill and tranquility of flying in Calm Skies. Perfect your wingsuit skills as you explore diverse biomes, dodge obstacles, and perform daring tricks to complete skill-testing challenges. Customize your character and enjoy a unique blend of excitement and serenity in the skies.

name: Exovoid Carnage
description: Exovoid Carnage is an intense wave-based arena shooter that cranks up the chaos to eleven. Shoot! Shred! Survive!

name: Signed Mary
description: A psychological horror visual novel, in which not your choices of action will determine the story’s end, but the choices of how to perceive your reality.

name: Foosball Runner
description: Dive into Foosball Runner, a thrilling twist on table football where you are the ball! Navigate futuristic tables in a spaceship, dodge spinning figures, collect keys, and unlock gates to score under a minute. Use power-ups to stop figures or boost your speed.

name: Banquet for Fools
description: The Pavura needs four volunteers to solve the mystery of an abandoned village. Answer the call in this party-based action adventure RPG.

name: Moonstone Island: Autumnal Accessories DLC Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Woohoo!: Game "Escape & Evade"
description: Escape & Evade is a game where you need to reach the exit without being detected. You'll need to be stealthy and stay out of sight from the security cameras while maneuvering around obstacles. Make sure you disable the lasers before you walk through a door protected by lasers.

name: Living Room
description: "Living Room" is a mixed reality eco-sim for the Meta Quest 3, in which you can nurture a charming, interactive ecosystem. Enjoy the simple pleasures of tending to plants, caring for adorably derpy animals, and watching your environment flourish. This cozy experience is perfect for relaxing, and unwinding, while also offering a somewhat chaotic and delightful escape into nature's beauty right inside your living room.

name: Musicmenia
description: Musicmenia is a strategic and musical card game. Face off online against other players, build your deck, and adapt your strategy to win. Adjust the tempo and lead your concert to victory!

name: Rogue Waters
description: Rogue Waters is a tactical turn-based rogue-lite in a cursed pirate world. Build a fierce crew of rogues and form alliances with mythical creatures as you navigate an ever-changing world and master combat on land and sea. The crew and the Kraken await your command—will you heed the call?

name: Nostalgic Entropy
description:
As the sun sets on the horizon, the last rays of light fade in the sky, like dancing ambers of a half-forgotten memory.

This place feels strange yet familiar in a nostalgic way. But you know not all memories are good, so steel yourself for the journey ahead.

name: Archipel Logic Infinite
description: Explore archipelagos and chart the boundaries between land and sea in 「Archipel Logic Infinite」. Dive into grid-based puzzles by marking cells as land or sea. Immerse yourself in story-driven puzzles and endless AI-generated challenges for limitless brain-teasing adventures.

name: Dras'lia
description: An RPG with enhanced combat dynamics! QTE, group actions, and more to come! Master the eight classes, and combine powers by equipping two classes simultaneously in combat! Change freely and fine-tune your strategy!

name: Vengeance Hunters
description:
Vengeance Hunters is an adrenaline fueled Neo-Geo hardware developed beat’em’up that lets you and a friend in local co-op fight mutants, zombies, punks, gangsters, lab techs with bombs (you read that correctly), suited mystery men, cyborgs and more across multiple stages, sub-levels and secret areas.

You'll be focused on fast and frantic action, combos and even a small bit of story. Vengeance Hunters features an amazing OST as well as incredible pixel art. Combat isn't the standard era combat that you've seen over and over since the 90's. Each playable character has their own Signature Move and style that will greatly change how you play.

name: Bounce Arcade
description:
Enter the machine and play pinball like you've never seen before in Bounce Arcade!
Wield your hands as paddles, guiding the ball through a series of immersive pinball worlds, each with their own challenges and surprises.
Nostalgic and frantic elements of classic pinball join all-new skills for a fast-paced arcade experience. Use a tractor beam to attract the ball back to you, and use a controllable lasso to nudge the ball where you want it to go for the ultimate skill shots (if you can master them).
Each world brings its own unique mini-games to the table. In a dusty western town, your paddles transform into pistols for a shooting gallery. In a futuristic space station, use the ball to break up asteroids that enter the docking bay.
Experience chaotic pinball action, flipped inside out!

name: Rolldown
description: Race against your friends in this fast paced and exciting game. The goal is simple: be the first ball to roll down to the bottom of the hill.

name: Shovel Knight: Dig - Wicked Wishes
description: Sin descripción

name: Gate Guardian
description: Gate Guardian is a casual fantasy roguelike with rich build options. You are the guardian of the Gate of Life, who protects it from Death. Create combinations of skills, improve and radically change them with modifiers. Survive Death!

name: The Throne
description: "The Throne" is a medieval adventure in true Metroidvania style. Get lost in a huge castle with 2.5D pixel art environments and increase your power with new abilities you find along the way. Fight fearsome bosses and navigate dangerous traps to make your way to the throne room!

name: Woyo!!
description:
A french retro styled RPG inspired by Earthbound and Conker's bad fur day.

Play as Sam, freshly arrived in Montreuil City (in Paris's outskirts) from his native countryside, who finds himself embroiled in a series of incredible adventures.
Set off to discover this mysterious world, where you'll meet colorful characters who'll help you get to grips with local customs.
Learn to harness the power of the Shtrak to face down the dangerous enemies that stand in your way (pigeons, bandits, stroller moms and other hoodlums) and maraud them like a true narvalo de la Croix de Chavaux ! Will you be able to get out of trouble, or will you find yourself in the middle of it all ?
Your fate is in your own hands!

name: Sonny Legacy Collection
description: Sonny 1 and Sonny 2, updated for modern hardware, team up in the Sonny Legacy Collection. Traverse a story-rich world where strategy meets supernatural in a quest for identity and survival. Master tactical turn-based combat and discover the truth behind Sonny's resurrection in these classic RPGs.

name: Escape the Kreegan
description: Escape corruption and deliver truth to the people in the only way you know how. as a space fighter pilot! You steal a ship and flee, it falls to you to duke it out in space and deliver truth to the people. Restore peace. Restore justice. Save humanity and Escape The Kreegan!

name: StarMetal Crusaders
description: Unique Take on classic RTS gameplay that blend resource management, base-building, and real-time combat. Utilize a unique fusion system to upgrade your structures, customize your Units, and adapt to ever-changing challenges on the battlefield.

name: Bulletmancer
description: Choose a wizard to wield the Arcane Turret, combine different bullet spells and survive until the final boss comes to face you! In this horde survival roguelite you will be creating new crazy shooting combos every run.

name: The Devil is in the Details
description: You're trapped in hell, and the only way out is to beat the devil at its own game. With the help of a mysterious entity known only as 'The Arbiter,' navigate through ominous surroundings and place talismans on cursed objects while trying to survive the many traps and foes lurking in the shadows.

name: Game Builder Tycoon
description: In Game Builder Tycoon, begin as an indie game developer. Personalize your character, craft hit games, manage marketing, research stuff and manage a skilled team. Overcome competition to guide your game development studio to global recognition and dominate the gaming industry.

name: Crystal Heroes
description: A Fantasy RPG game using Match 3 for game mechanics instead of Dice.

name: Changeable Guardian Estique
description:
An original side-scrolling shoot 'em up game for Nintendo Entertainment System being developed by Cat Hoi Trading LLC set to release in the Summer of 2024.

The game is set in 5 world cities and space, for a total of 6 stages. The moderate difficulty and play time, as well as a large number of visuals, will delight the eyes and minds of the player.

A demo was sold at the Digigame Expo 2023.

name: Zoochosis
description: Zoochosis is a bodycam horror simulation game. You’re a night zookeeper. Identify infected mutant animals, make a vaccine and cure them. Will you save all of them and survive?

name: Match Tree
description:
It's a match tree game. A fresh approach. Meet the Pixie, the Gnome and the Witch and build them homes.

You combine flowers, carrots and trees.
But be aware of the SHEEP!

Currently free Alpha on itch. Will come to Desktop and mobile later.

https://andi-dev.itch.io/matchtree

name: Counter Mark 2 Saga: Seven Sacred Heroes
description: Counter Mark 2 Saga: Seven Sacred Heroes is a 2D tactical strategy game and the sequel to "Countermark Saga Frozen sword." The game tells the adventurous story of a modern-day youth who travels through time.

name: NeoDuel: Backpack Monsters
description: NeoDuel: Backpack Monsters is a PvP inventory auto-battler with a monster-trainer twist! Collect Cosmions and items, and strategically manage your backpack to create unbeatable combos in tactical duels. Rise through the leagues to become the ultimate Cosmion master!

name: Block Strategy
description: Block Strategy is an RTS game where the world is made up of blocks that can be placed or destroyed to change the terrain. Gather materials by exploring or destroying enemies, and use them to expand your base and defend against an onslaught of enemies.

name: Persona 3 Portable: Grimoire Edition
description: Persona 3 Portable: Grimoire Edition from Limited Run Games includes the Grimoire Book Box, a Persona 3 Portable Slipcover for the box, a physical copy of Persona 3 Portable for the selected platform and a Steelbook case for the game.

name: Starfield: Shattered Space
description: This will be the first story expansion to Starfield. This DLC is bundled with Premium Edition (digital), Premium Edition Upgrade (digital), Premium Edition Upgrade (physical), and Constellation Edition of Starfield.

name: Poetry of Blood: Eclipse
description: Poetry of Blood: Eclipse is a 2D rogue-lite platformer action game. Heroine "Yue", codenamed Ishtar, fight against various enemies using different weapons, equipment and mechs. Explore the futuristic world and uncover the astonishing secrets hidden behind!

name: MechCrisis
description: Is there any way we can protect ourselves from intelligent machines? Choose your weapon, choose your exclusive character, upgrade your skills, and enjoy 15 minutes of pigeon experience.

name: Tenebris: Terra Incognita
description: A turn-based tactical RPG in which you will explore a harsh planet teeming with terrifying monsters. Experiment with talent builds for 23 heroes. Combine abilities with equipment and other characters. Assemble a squad and learn the secrets of the planet Tenebris!

name: Into the Necrovale
description: Into the Necrovale is an Action RPG in which you collect powerful items that interact in unexpected ways. You must be clever with your build if you hope to pierce the mysteries and dangers of the Necrovale, where a thousand generations of miscreants and criminals have been banished.

name: Silence of the Siren
description: Turn-based sci-fi strategy game that combines exploration and exciting clashes on the battlefield. Take control over several different species, raise powerful armies and destroy your opponents!

name: Left to Rot
description: Left to Rot: is a first-person psychological horror with a heavy focus on exploration and immersion that will leave your blood running cold. The player must solve puzzles, explore the surroundings and survive. Navigate through unsettling environments and constantly changing rooms.

name: The City of Plague
description: This is an open world Zombie Survival game, The location of the game is set in the city. You are forced to stay in the city because you can't catch up with the evacuation team. You need to defend the camp with other survivors who stay in the city and survive.

name: RatPark
description: Sin descripción

name: Blazing Strike: Limited Edition
description:
Limited Edition includes:
- The Game
- Full color 112 pg art book with @absolum illustrations
- CD Soundtrack w/ original illustration cover
- Set of 14 collectible character cards

name: Half-Baked Girls
description: Follow the adventures of two young girls as they explore a mysterious haunted mansion in Half-Baked Girls, a 3D indie role-playing game.

name: The Dreamwalkers
description: The DreamWalkers is a fantasy visual novel located in Paris. Take control of Morgan's destiny as he discovers the possibility of lucid dreaming. Help him make the right choices and explore Dreams through point & click phases.

name: Dying Light 2 Stay Human: Digital Extras Edition
description: Filled with digital goodies, the Digital Extras Edition gives you the full Dying Light 2 Stay Human experience and more! Enjoy Aiden's story, as well as the ‘Bloody Ties' DLC, and get a look behind it with all the extras! Good luck, and stay human!

name: Delivery Point Simulator
description: Welcome to "Delivery Point Simulator"!Manage a parcel pickup point: receive and deliver packages, improve infrastructure, purchase licenses for new products, manage transportation, and invest money in the bank. Become a leader in the logistics industry!

name: Is it okay for me to live
description:
A strange little Windows 98 style game about life, made for the Spooktober Visual Novel Jam 2024.

Based on some dreams and strange trips, combined into something more akin to an experience versus a traditional story. Heavy inspirations from Tsui no Sora and its peers.

name: 0101: Pusher Bonus Levels 1
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Pusher levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: V Bomb
description: Sin descripción

name: Late Night Surfing
description: Tune in to TV straight from the dark dimension! But beware: not everything on TV is real. Late Night Surfing is a psychological horror visual novel. Demo was released on itchio on September 29, 2024.

name: NBA Jam: 1990's On Fire Edition
description: NBA JAM: 1990's On Fire Edition is a historical conversion mod of NBA JAM: On Fire Edition for PlayStation 3. It features every franchise's best teams of the 1990's (and 80's). Every team has accurate uniforms, courts and arenas, coaches, and logos.

name: deathwish
description: A melancholic tale set in a forest and you don't remember who you are. It comes with 5k words, 4 animated endings, and an endless love story.

name: Who's There
description: This game is a short retro horror experience. Features include a realistic environment, 3D sounds, object interaction, and a VHS film effect.

name: New Fief
description: A relaxed and peaceful territorial management game, without the interference of hostile/competitive forces, allowing you to farm with peace of mind.

name: Wuthering Waves: To the Shore's End
description:
Version 1.3 of Wuthering Waves, which included:
• New characters: Shorekeeper and Youhu
• New main story quest: Chapter 1 Act 8
• New companion story for Encore: Small Wooly, Big Adventures
• New echoes, events and more!

name: Yumeiro Cast: Take a Curtain Call
description:
The franchise started to be distributed in 2015, impressing with its stage/musical actor + fully voiced story + rhythm game concept
Now, and surprising everyone, Sega announced that it is working on porting the full game Yumeiro Cast as a one-time paid app for smartphones.

name: Master of Love
description: Single and unemployed, 33-year-old Jun-Ho finds himself transported back in time ten years. He takes the chance to romance five women from his past – and get it right this time. Unlock five unique endings in Master of Love, an FMV game that offers the ultimate K-drama experience.

name: Croaking Around
description:
Use your tongue to pull, sling and swing acrobatically to get around the hazardous underground.
The game focuses on simple platforming gameplay combined with spectacular aerial acrobatics and a cute cartoony artstyle.
It's pure fun for the whole family (it's singleplayer so you're going to have to take turns sorry).

name: Halluci-Sabbat of Koishi
description: Touhou Project, Komeiji Koishi's Action Game, with collision between sword and magic! Help Marisa hold a Sabbat of witches, and explore the way of treasure hunt with wisdom and strength. On the day of the war, there is the glory of death and no shame of life.

name: Panzer Commander
description: Panzer Commander was a mid 90s tank simulator released by SSI that allowed a player to take the wheel of various Allied and Axis tanks in World War II.

name: Natsu no Sagashimono: What We Found That Summer
description: Summer vacation is finally here, and the next few weeks promise to be anything but uneventful! Natsu has just 30 days to acclimate to life in the countryside, help the locals face their demons, find that special someone, and gain the self-confidence to return home with his head held high!

name: Missing
description:
Missing is a short horror puzzle game in a PSX style.

Your daughter has gone missing. She isn’t returning any of your calls, which is unlike Sarah. Unfortunately, the police feel that she hasn’t been missing long enough to file it as a missing person’s report. Taking matters into your own hands, you realise the location of her phone is still on and, wasting no time, drive down to the location to find out what happened to Sarah.

name: Can You Get Off Work on Time?
description: This is an independent role-playing puzzle game. You will play as a worker who is about to get off work at six o'clock, but encounters a series of workplace troubles that prevent you from getting off work on time. Is it really just a luxury to get off work on time?

name: 0101: Classic Bonus Levels 1
description: This DLC includes another 10 bonus Classic levels, extremely cool, which will make you love the game even more.

name: Little Screamies
description:
Explore the world of Little Screamies!

BUT BEWARE!!

Not everything is as it seems
at Little Laboratories Inc....

Made by development team at Nukepop Games!

name: WooLoop: Magic Pack
description: This Magic-themed gallery unlocks 21 additional levels for WooLoop! Images are mystical, magical and all-around fantastical!

name: Bambi: A Life in the Woods
description: This visual novel follows Bambi, now an adult and respected leader in the forest, alongside his longtime friends and new children, Geno and Gurr.

name: Theme Park Jam
description: Match 3 and ride the roller coaster

name: Grimwild Horror
description: A newspaper article from 1994, titled "MASS MURDER AT GRIMWILD", put everyone into trauma as all the residents of Grimwild were found dead, their bodies dismembered. After this incident, the city was cut off and everyone was prohibited from entering it. What might have happened?

name: B Math
description:
B MATH is a fast-paced one-button game.

Your goal is to select which one of the five numbers is the correct for the equation. You have limited time for your answer. The faster you answer, the more points you'll score. After every correct answer you get a score multiplier. After every incorrect answer, you lose some time.

The game will end when the time runs out.

name: Marlow in Apocalyptic Acid World
description:
Marlow in Apocalyptic Acid World is a platform game for ZX Spectrum 128k, inspired by "The Great Giana Sisters." What? Did you think the inspiration came from a certain mustache plumber? No way…

Navigate this vast apocalyptic world by jumping, stomping on enemies, collecting crystals, and breaking blocks with your head across 4 worlds, totaling 16 levels and 5 Boss battles.

name: Intensive (S)care Unit
description:
Lia, a junior resident, steps into her first night shift in the ICU, expecting exhaustion, not trepidation. Alongside her senior, Satria, this shift begins to unravel in unsettling ways—bells ringing from empty rooms, whispers crawling through the halls, and the dead returning with unfinished business.

As Lia confronts an eerie truth, she begins to question: is this night shift outside the bounds of reality—or has she crossed over herself?

name: Shadows
description: Shadows is a very personal tribute to Death Bear's mapping origins and the journey they've been on the last four years. Shadows is a Vanilla Limit-Removing megawad, with Episode 1 inspired loosely by Knee Deep in the Dead. Each of the episodes follow similar themes as the original, with some personal flavor and some added twists.

name: Rot in Paradise
description: Rot in Paradise is a short 2D horror visual novel set in October of Australia, following the story of a vacationist named June and her friends on a weekend getaway at an island resort where they have no choice but to go with the tides.

name: Buffet Boss: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Real Cake Maker: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Ecchi Blast Vol. 1
description: Prepare for an unforgettable experience and have a blast with cute anime girls.

name: 101 Cats Hidden in Los Angeles
description: Find and discover 101 cute cats hidden throughout the Los Angeles landscape in this hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Forest Cafe Simulator
description: It's time to take care of cute animals and build a cozy cafe for them in a forest clearing. Get everything ready for the reception. Add various tasty dishes and drinks to the menu.

name: Illegal Simulator
description: "Illegal Simulator" puts you in the midst of two different lives. While running a legal market during the day, you'll manage illegal casinos and harvest banned substances at night. Collaborate with mafia gangs, have fun at strip clubs, and become the most famous figure in the underworld!

name: Shizuku: Japanese myth
description: "Shizuku : Japanese myth" is a 2D action game set in Japan. The fox girl can transform into various forms, and can take over not only the form of the target but also its abilities. There is no single answer, and the game can be played according to your style of play.

name: Elmarion: The Lost Temple
description: “Elmarion: the Lost Temple” is a first-person party RPG. The player plays in a squad of 4 adventurers, choosing from 8 different classes. During the game, the squad explores the dungeons, clears them of monsters, and solves puzzles. Purpose of the game: to get an ancient powerful artifact.

name: Drome van Slange Bundle
description: The clashing of 2 opposing worlds! This super combo of a bundle whisks you away to ethereal, mystical realm on the one side and then plunges you into a violent, bloody game of death and survival on the other end, making for a satisfyingly complimentary game duo.

name: Verlore Drome van Slange Bundle
description: 3 vastly different worlds, 3 mystifyingly varied experiences and 3 completely different types of challenges. Are ready to take on this gargantuan challenge and put yourself to the ultimate test. From traveling mysterious realms, exploring dreams and solving other-worldly puzzles to taking on an arena of mutant creatures and becoming the ultimate warrior in a game show to the death. This package is sure to put all of your skills to the test!

name: Verlore Slange: Bundle
description: 2 diametrically opposed realms amalgamated together. One of tranquility, mystery and discovery. The other of violence, adrenaline and surviving absurd creatures. Can you conquer the whole spectrum that these 2 worlds offer? Are you ready for a journey that will put you to the test in more ways you can imagine?

name: 8Floor Bundle 4 in 1 part 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Outbreak: Genesis Collection
description: The undead apocalypse reaches Cypress Ridge in these retro survival horror nightmares!

name: The Smurfs: Colorful Stories - Magnificent Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fit My Zoo: Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Dungeon RPG
description: Dive into procedurally generated dungeons filled with hidden treasures, cunning traps, and fierce monsters. Customize your hero with a vast array of weapons, armor, and magical items. Engage in strategic turn-based combat, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover the rich lore of the dungeon. Face formidable bosses and adopt loyal pets to aid you in battle.

name: 100 Animals on an Island
description: Embark on an incredible adventure on an island where 100 adorable animals await you! Explore the mysterious island and try to find all the creatures hidden in the game.

name: Slum Guide
description: Explore a mysterious slum town and recruit women seeking fortune. Use them as fighters in a coliseum or to defend yourself against local threats. As a cunning guide, gather intel, use tools, and manipulate secrets to immerse them into the town's hidden desires.

name: Fake Ducks: Spooky Chronicles
description:
"Fake Ducks: Spooky Chronicles" is a turn-based RPG inspired by the great classics set in the present day.
It tells of the misadventures of a group of bizarre friends who, thanks to the powers gained from an ancient pendant, must prevent a mysterious individual from getting his hands on a dark talisman that could compromise the future of the world. There's just one problem... Let's just say that our friends are not the classic heroes expected to save the planet.
Form your ideal team and explore a total of seven levels filled with puzzles, riddles, obstacles, hidden rewards, and face hordes of strange enemies and monsters in turn-based combat with simple but strategic and often challenging mechanics.

name: Shei Toule Wo de Nu Pengyou
description: This game tells the story of the player through the clues on the slips of paper to find the stolen girlfriend！

name: Sivi's Factory
description: Sivi's Factory is a single player first-person horror game in which you play as Felix. You are looking for your brother on the scientific factory. Solve puzzles on the locations, explore new rooms, fight your enemy and go deeper into factory.

name: Plutonium: Kilimanjaro Oddysey
description: This was originally meant to be “Plutonia 11” in reference to another Plutonia jokewad but ended up being a decent wad that mixes variety of quality in mapping (experienced and new mappers in the Project) with some humour BUT IT IS NOT A JOKEWAD.

name: Depths of Endor
description: Classic, turn-based dungeon crawler RPG. A retro-styled adventure that combines the best elements of old-school role-playing games with modern features of a roguelike.

name: Encircled
description: Sin descripción

name: The Painting
description: A short, emotional visual novel following a grieving man who relives memories of days long gone. An exploration of loss presented honestly and kinetically.

name: I Hate My Fingers
description: Sin descripción

name: Animal Kung Fu
description: Lin, a young and clumsy red panda with big dreams of being a guardian, embarks on a dangerous mission to save his valley.

name: The Super Bunnies: Scarlet Wonder Ninjas
description: In this visual novel, a group of brave ninja rabbits embark on an exciting mission to protect their peaceful village.

name: Gabibbo Massacre
description: Indie horror game made as a parody of the popular italian mascotte "Gabibbo".

name: Tsumugi no Hanayome
description: Sin descripción

name: Smily Angry
description: Sin descripción

name: Nowa Online World
description: Nowa Online World is a mobile role-playing game about the war between human and orc developed by Nowa Games.

name: Slumbering Feline
description: Sin descripción

name: Grand Rush VR: Highway Car Traffic Racing Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Mortar Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Fossil Skater
description: A racing game where you ride dinosaurs who skate with car-shoes.

name: Portraits of Doom
description: Portraits of Doom is a 20 map set for Doom I and Doom II. The first episode takes place in Doom I, followed by a special New Game Plus in Doom II. This NG+ features Doom II weapons and monsters. It also reimagines the first episode, complete with different progression at times. For instance: things that exploded in the first episode now lie in ruin in NG+. All combined into one single Doom II wad file for your convenience.

name: AetherShot
description: Aethershot is a 2D top-down rogue-lite with a spell crafting system to allow for great customization when delving into the trial grounds at the Temple of Masrong.

name: Hotel 12th
description: Trapped in a mysterious hotel with 12 floors, you're caught in a never-ending loop. Each floor hides secrets and clues—only by paying close attention to the details can you break free. Your goal? Descend to the 0th floor and escape, but beware, the hotel doesn't want you to leave…

name: Doll Dress Up: Cute DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Doll Dress Up: Classy DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Value Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Bowling Fever: Superior Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Moto Rush GT: Infinite Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Reynatis: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cooking Arena Doner Delight
description: Your adventure begins with Food Truck Tycoon, where you can cook, chop, bake, and enjoy hundreds of unique dishes. But the journey of a thousand dishes is just the beginning! As you hone your cooking skills and build your reputation with food trucks, you'll be given the opportunity to explore more gourmet games as DLC. Customize your kitchen with countless upgrades and serve delicious food in different locations, keeping the grill hot, your customers smiling, and sautéing, mixing, and serving to the top. Face cooking challenges to become the ultimate chef in town! So put on your apron, sharpen your knives, and enter the cooking arena - life is a party, so let's cook delicious!

name: Reynatis: Marin & Sari's Formal Wear Costumes (Exclusive Color)
description: Sin descripción

name: Reynatis: Marin's "Another" Weapon
description: Sin descripción

name: Reynatis: "Another" Color Costume DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Reynatis: Radiant Wizart DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Lets Castle
description: Build your castle and become a knight!

name: Parkour Bullet Frenzy: FPS, Physics, Slowmotion
description: Navigate deadly traps and ruthless foes in a high-tech labyrinth of speed and precision.

name: Turbo Boost Racing
description: Turbo Boost Racing is a fun, fast-paced arcade style driving game with 4 exciting game modes!

name: Doll Dress Up
description: Become the best doll stylist and make a fabulous princess!

name: Firebat: Revolution
description: Break every brick in this retro pixel art adventure!

name: Bodycam Shooter
description: Sin descripción

name: The Jumping Burger Rush
description:
From the creative minds at The Jumping Food Games comes a fast-paced endless game that will put your reflexes to the test: "The Jumping Burger Rush". In this neon-colored adventure, you control a jumping burger through the vastness of the galaxy and try to push your high score higher and higher. The adrenaline-pumping gameplay will test your reflexes in a fast and challenging endless game where you have to maneuver your burger through a dangerous, neon-lit galaxy.

Endless challenges await as you dodge obstacles, overcome tricky passages, and collect points to beat your own high score over and over again. Can you manage to break your personal record time and time again, dominating the leaderboard and proving your skill by outding yourself? Jump, dodge, and maneuver your burger through the infinite galaxy, mastering the unstoppable pace to beat your high score.

name: Tiny Starfighters
description: Embark on an exciting space adventure where you take control of a spaceship and battle endless waves of enemies across the galaxy. Collect coins as you blast through your foes and unlock new, powerful ships to enhance your journey. With every wave, the challenge intensifies—how long can you survive the cosmic chaos? Prepare to gear up and zap your way to victory!

name: Meanings: Hidden in Plain Sight
description: Meanings hidden in plain sight is an captivating word-guessing game where quick wit and sharp observation skills are your greatest assets. Look at an image, think quick, find the hidden meanings and grab the points for solving them!

name: Reynatis: Ultimate Wizard Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Anime Girls Military Strike
description: Step into the high-octane world of "Anime Girls Military Strike," where cute meets combat in this adrenaline-pumping first-person shooter. Gear up as one of several highly-trained anime girl operatives, each with their own unique abilities and kawaii charm. From twin-tailed snipers to genki girl grenadiers, assemble your dream team and take on missions across vibrant, anime-inspired battlefields.

name: Dreamland Farm
description: After living in a big city your dreams come true – today you start your new life on a peaceful pixel farm!

name: Senpai ga Watashi no Mousou ni Doujin Suru?!: Body Touch ni Goyoujin
description: Sin descripción

name: Yuukoku no Femme Fatale
description: Sin descripción

name: Pushing
description: 《Pushing》The game is mainly based on 3D box pushing. Players need to move the white blocks to their destination within the specified number of times.This game does not require players to complete one level before moving on to the next but it recommends players to complete the levels in order

name: Zombie Survivors
description: Fight against thousands of zombies and evil creatures in this action roguelite. Collect cards, pets, characters and evolve them to become strong and not become zombie food.

name: So Hungry
description: So Hungry is a casual idle game. Come and collect various animal and plant cards!

name: Looney Tunes: Wacky World of Sports - Deluxe Edition
description:
Exclusive to the Deluxe Edition:
• Play as everyone's favorite hombre: Yosemite Sam!
• Add a new team uniform to your selection with The Golden Outlaws! Suit up and get out there, and you might even bring home the Ultimate Cup!
• Add some new Wild West themed sports equipment to your collection including a new basketball, soccer ball, tennis racket, and set of golf clubs. Great horny toads!

name: NHL 25: Deluxe Edition
description: EA SPORTS NHL 25 is powered by ICE-Q, a new gameplay intelligence system that gives you the time and space to control every inch of the ice. Experience true hockey intelligence.

name: Blobbton
description:
The eccentric Architect of a utopian future society has decided to build a skyward city out of hexagon-shaped blocks. Unfortunately, the Architect is a perfectionist, and his ever-changing mood constantly alters the ideal plan. As his apprentice, it's your responsibility to fulfill his ever-changing wishes for the perfect possible layout and to earn his approval!

Blobbton is a bright and colorful world of hexagon-based puzzles. With its casual yet challenging-to-master approach, players of all skill levels can enjoy quick and peaceful puzzle-solving sessions!

name: I Hate My Legs
description: A Foddian style game about Jeff, a turtle with human legs trying to find his father! The faster you move, the further you jump. Time your jump with your speed to make it to your father!

name: None Shall Intrude: Descent
description: Venture into None Shall Intrude, a roguelite deck-builder with tile-based combat where you become a powerful Raid Boss. Epic battles, intricate strategies, and the ever-present threat of heroic challengers seeking to vanquish your reign. Will you conquer all or fall to valiant heroes?

name: Xiuzhen World 2
description: Xiuzhen World 2 is a 3D world where your goal is to level up from a mere mortal into an immortal at the end. Its a semi-idle game with fun immortal cultivation mechanics such as - leveling up to become stronger. - capturing monsters as pets to fight for you. - AFK(Away From Keybourd).

name: Cheese Co-op Clicker Simulator
description: Cheese Co-op Clicker Simulator 100 players

name: HiddenSet
description: Uncover hidden color combinations to recreate the original cube design. In advanced mode, combinations rotate at various angles. Enjoy dynamic bonuses and customizable difficulty for endless fun!

name: Prison Alone
description: A psychological horror game with NO jumpscares. Feel the tension and suspense, get goosebumps, experience strange frightening events, and explore, look for keys, solve puzzles, while thinking hard to find a way to get out of this huge, and maybe not so empty prison.

name: Unicopia
description: Unicopia is a retro 2D platformer featuring a Unicorn racing to rescue her girlfriend from the clutches of an Evil Poodle. Jump up and down towers, collect gems, and reveal the key before the clock strikes and you're haunted by the ghost of time!

name: Hagalegacy
description: Peel, jump, swap - Embark on a grand sticky adventure in "Hagalegacy" with Perin! Help Perin, the protagonist of this story, travel a world plunged into stickery-madness brought upon a witch's mischief in a puzzle-action game depicting their legacy.

name: Market Master Simulator
description: Take charge of a bustling supermarket in Market Master Simulator. Manage staff, inventory, and product creation while mastering advanced energy systems. Navigate challenges in this dynamic simulation game now in Early Access.

name: EA Sports FC 25
description: EA SPORTS FC 25 gives you more ways to win for the club. Team up with friends in your favourite modes with the new 5v5 Rush, and manage your club to victory as FC IQ delivers more tactical control than ever before.

name: Popcorn Fever
description:
Popcorn Fever is a “suika game” featuring popcorns, developed by Yunicorn Studio !

Need a coffee break, stuck in a long commute, or just want to pass the time? Start a game and merge as many popcorns as you can!

Aim, drop, and merge the popcorns to score points. Customize your game by unlocking unique and surprising powers. Find your own style and climb the leaderboard !

Will you reach the top of the best player pantheon?!

name: Toon Troops Strategy
description: Toon Troops Strategy, where strategic thinking meets cartoon mayhem! Engage in tactical battles, outwit your opponents, and lead your colorful cast of characters to victory in this charming adaptation of the classic capture the flag style game.

name: Looney Tunes: Wacky World of Sports
description:
Compete against friends and family with the Looney Tunes squad in basketball, soccer, golf and tennis.

Play your way solo or in four-player local co-op and choose the characters that best suit your play style.

Avoid wacky obstacles and gain power-ups to incite chaos as you control your favorite Looney Tunes all-stars!

name: Sparky: Hills of Death
description: Hito Corporation immerses players in a dark universe where the monster, Sparky, comes to life in a sinister way, blurring the boundaries between reality and game. While cyber security expert Zac and his girlfriend Marina face strange events both in the game and in real life.

name: Board Wars: Trick Or Treat
description: Board Wars ToT is a couch-op, local multiplayer board game intended for family/friend game nights. Take turns rolling dice to manually RUN across the board to Trick-Or-Treat and deliver more candy than the other players!

name: Insectum: Epic Battles of Bugs
description: Immerse yourself in the epic battles of "Insectum" and unleash the power of your monstrous insects. Face off against your rivals on the battlefield by strategically using cards.

name: Another Realm
description: You awaken at the shores of a land seemingly far from home, your boat wrecked, not really knowing what actually happened. Your only option is to find civilization and hope to find a way home. Not all is as it seems, as Jimmy will soon find out!

name: A Hunter's Tale
description: Explore Fuji's mysteries in this VR RPG adventure. Battle massive beasts, conquer challenges, and grow stronger with each encounter.

name: A Few Days With: Violette
description: Embark on a sensual butterfly-hunting adventure with Violette, a captivating young woman. In this hidden object game, explore each location to discover what lies beneath Violette's enticing layers.

name: Wealth Project
description: Practice mindfulness! Divide assets and liabilities! Calculate your net worth and how much time it takes to reach your dreams! Set a clear vision and goals to create your own wealth project!

name: Russian Roulette: Online
description: "Russian Roulette: Online" is a pulse-pounding multiplayer survival game where speed and luck determine the victor. Dive into the chaos for an adrenaline-fueled showdown—only the fastest and luckiest will emerge victorious!

name: VRLegs
description: Welcome to "VRLegs", where the thrill of parkour meets the immersive world of virtual reality. Step into a realm where your movements are fluid, intuitive, and empowering.

name: Summoner's Sky
description: Get ready to embark on an adventure across the floating islands! Accompanied by your trusty Summon Book, you can battle monsters great and small with your own. The fate of the world is in your hands.

name: Plumber Survivors
description: Plumber Survivors is an arena action with Roguelike elements. Play as the formidable Plumber (and his friends), repel hordes of zombies and other vile creatures. Grab you plunger tight and plunge into the fight.

name: Sustained
description: This is a open world Survival Zombie game with allot of survival mechanics and PVP in Multiplayer. Join a few friends and look who can survive the island full of zombies and other players trying to survive like you, it has base building, food, water, Temp and much more

name: AstroMole
description: AstroMole is a 2D Platformer Collectathon where you play as a Mole with a Jetpack that can Fly through space, Land on Planets and dig up treasure in randomised levels. Explore Black Holes filled with strange creatures, treacherous obstacles and valuable jewels hidden differently each time you play!

name: Commander Bug Wars
description: Dive into the thrilling clash between humans and cybernetic bugs. Lead your infantry, tanks, aircraft, and ships through intense battles. Use strategy and tactics to outsmart your foes. Every decision shapes the war's outcome. Are you ready for the challenge? Time to eat the Bugs!

name: Reynatis: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition of Reynatis includes the game, a digital soundtrack and a mini art book.

name: Princess Paradise
description: "I want that person." The princess's life trajectory intersects with the hearts of the two men.

name: Deep Space Tavern
description: Deep Space Tavern is a playful fusion of management and clicker gameplay. Design your tavern, attract patrons from across the system, and master the art of keeping them happy and safe. Experience the joy of management without all the hassle!

name: Uberslaughter
description: Uberslaughter is an adrenaline-pumping retro Movement Shooter that pays homage to classic FPS. Embark on a gory inter-dimensional odyssey in order to neutralize high-priority targets. Butcher you way through hordes of enemies. Accumulate vast riches. Rescue a helpless kitten. And slaughter them all.

name: Idle Stellar
description: Embark on an epic adventure through the cosmos in Idle Stellar. Gather, trade, craft, upgrade your spaceship and fight enemies. Whether you play actively or look for a relaxed idle experience, the journey ahead is rich in features and content!

name: One S'More
description: Can you help your marshmallow friend to fulfill his dream of becoming a tasty S'More? One S'More is a challenging puzzle game, set in a tasty environment. Connect 2 chocolate biscuits and reach them with your marshmallow.

name: Axon TD: Uprising
description: From the developers of Element TD 2 comes a Mazing Tower Defense where you can expand the map layout itself. A huge arsenal of towers and a wide variety of enemies clash in a battlefield that shifts on your whims. Engage in single, cooperative, or roguelite gameplay.

name: Start Over
description: Start Over is a thrilling multiplayer survival game that takes you to a deserted island where you must build a base, craft equipment, and defend against waves of enemies. Collaborate with other players to build a thriving community, or become a lone wolf.

name: Graamaseva
description: Graamaseva is the first top-down view, horizontal scrolling run n' gun arcade game.

name: Isle of Swaps
description: Grab your cards, it's time to swap! Battle your school pals in this roguelite deckbuilder where you'll trade for new cards when you win defeat them and rip open booster packs looking for rare cards. Conquer everyone's dungeon decks to become Critter Champion of the Playground!

name: One Armed Bandit
description: Spin to win in this colorful casino-themed, slot-machine-building roguelike!

name: Hitmen Havoc
description: Hitmen Havoc is a cartoony 2D arena shooter for 2-8 players. Dive into relentless party battles with a variety of weapons and abilities. 8 unique characters, and multiple dynamic arenas. It's perfect for friends or foes seeking exciting, competitive gameplay.

name: Animal Drifters
description: Check out Animal Drifters right now if you like racing games and test your skills in a wonderful, fast paced racing experience.

name: Dwarven Realms
description: Face massive hordes of mobs and unleash chaotic abilities that paint the screen with mayhem. Dive into the largest mob density of any 3D ARPG and slay them all. Wield epic powers, create your build, and shape a world of endless possibilities in the action-packed ARPG experience.

name: Egg Boy
description: " EGG BOY " is a parkour fighting game based on cute cartoon style, including both single and multiplayer modes. Dozens of party levels, hundreds of different types of EGG BOYs to choose from, rich and interesting activity modes to participate in.

name: Ultimate Zombie Defense 2
description: 4-player co-op, zombie slaying, base building, boss battling mayhem! Cleanse the infected wave by wave and upgrade your base with traps & defenses in Ultimate Zombie Defense 2!

name: Ahro
description: Ahro is an atmospheric side-scrolling adventure game set in an intriguing world of exploration and lore. Out now on Nintendo Switch and Steam!

name: The Phantom Fellows
description: The Phantom Fellows is about two best friends who start a paranormal investigation business together, since one of them is already dead.

name: Stock Market Tycoon: Challenge
description: A competitive multiplayer real-time stock market investment game where players compete globally to achieve maximum investment returns. Trade live stocks in a simulated economy and manage your portfolio in a real-time virtual stock exchange.

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: The Finals: Season 4 - It's Showtime!
description:
Season 4 was the fourth season of THE FINALS. It launched on September 26, 2024, and ended on December 12, 2024. It was revealed on September 12, 2024, and previewed on September 20, 2024, at TwitchCon San Diego.

Season 4 puts particular focus on the sponsors of THE FINALS and the game show environment itself, with sponsors featured heavily in the season's arena and new progression paths.

This season was sponsored by HOLTOW, ENGIMO, and ISEUL-T, who introduced the all-new arena Fortune Stadium and the new sponsor career.

New content introduced in Season 4 includes:
- Arena: Fortune Stadium
- New cosmetics
- New Battle Pass
- Weapons: M26 Matter, Pike-556, .50 Akimbo
- Weapon sights
- Enhanced World Tour
- Progression: Sponsorships, new career levels

Season 4 reintroduced:
- Ranked Cashout tournaments

description:

Meet the 'TEKKEN Series Song' package now!
This DLC contains a total of 12 songs.
Now enjoy the songs of TEKKEN in DJMAX RESPECT V.

name: Man For Takeaway
description: This is an independently developed game that simulates deliver the take-out. There are various scenes in the game, such as day, night, and rain. You can also experience using different modes of transportation for food delivery and feel the competition among peers.

name: Incident Mahjong
description: "Incident Mahjong" is a Mahjong game where you play while keeping an eye out for "incidents" that occur during the game. When you spot an "incident," make the appropriate tile discard decision, and sometimes point out problematic melds or discarded tiles.

name: All You Need is Help: The Lively Friends Pack
description: This downloadable pack includes four characters with special voices and four pieces of furniture. Penguin Wolf Raccoon Shiba Inu Shaved Ice Machine BBQ Grill Chabudai (low table) Telescope Requires the full version of 'All You Need is Help! - Ready, Set, Puffer Pop!' sold separately.

name: All You Need is Help: Lively Friends Bundle
description:
"Bumping around! Helping each other! Turn your friendships into friend-shapes!"
Dive into a quirky multiplayer co-op puzzle game where adorable, fluffy cube-shaped creatures collaborate to reach their goals.
These creatures, each oddly shaped, jostle against each other to help solve puzzles together.
When in trouble, shout "HELP!" and friends will surely come to your aid. With everyone's strength, turn friendships into friend-shapes!

name: Hell Frontier
description: ViolentBeetle's solo megawad with development spanning their entire mapping career.

name: Refuted Wind
description: This is an atmospheric adventure that will immerse you in a mysterious story. During the game, you will visit many unique places, each of which evokes a feeling of fear and anxiety.

name: Beach Boys: Tarot Hot Cards
description: Discover the power of tarot and win the boy of your dreams. Let the cards reveal the secrets to capturing his heart. Make love work in your favor!

name: Once Clover Died
description: Clover is a black cat who lost one of her 9 lives after being scared to death by a recent break-in. With 8 lives left, she treads the world very carefully to avoid any other incidents that might lead to losing even more.

name: Frost Survivors: Text Game
description:
Frost Survivors: Rogue-like Text Game in a post-apocalyptic world!
Get ready to face the eternal winter in Frost Survivors, a challenging roguelike text game set in a post-apocalyptic world.
Lead your survivors through strategic decisions in a world ravaged by nuclear war and endless winter, teeming with zombies, mutants, and bandits.

name: Blast Course
description: Blast Course is a first-person platformer centered around the classic game mechanic of Rocket Jumping. Control Kit in a day at work testing "Hyperboom", a revolutionary transport technology based on explosives.

name: Chior
description: You had a pretty rough fall. Trying to regain your composure you try to look around before realizing you can't see anything. Hope that your other senses will serve you better.

name: Alma the Captive
description:
Alma the Captive is a short exploration adventure game with a playtime of around 20 to 30 minutes.

Though originally created as a practice in game development, it turned out to be something easily enjoyable, so I’ve decided to release it.

The story has a dark, subdued tone centered around the theme of painting. While it is not intended to provide a horror experience, it does contain mild horror elements. Please be cautious if you are sensitive to such content.
