name: Arcade Archives: Blast Off
description: "Blast Off" is a shooter released by Namco in 1989. Use the four selectable types of equipment to defeat the resurrected Neo Bosconian. In addition, you can fire a piercing bullet by holding down the shot.

name: Anime Puzzle Quest: The Magical Girls Adventure
description: Join the Magical Girls on a Heartwarming Adventure – where every puzzle brings new bonds and discoveries.

name: Liquidation: Zombie Apocalypse
description: Liquidation: Zombie Apocalypse is an intense survival-action game set in a world devastated by a zombie outbreak. As one of the last survivors, your mission is to "liquidate" hordes of the undead, reclaim lost territories, and restore order.

name: Zombie Slaughter: Dead Zone
description: Survive the zombie apocalypse! Kill zombies to stay alive in this thrilling game. Experience 2-player arcade-style gameplay and cooperate to defeat approaching zombies.

name: Anime Girls: Beautiful Bride
description: Meet over 50 pretty anime girls in this relaxing puzzle game!

name: Atari 50: The Wider World of Atari
description:
The story’s not over yet! THE WIDER WORLD OF ATARI introduces a new timeline with more games, historical artifacts and video interviews that explore the creation of Atari games. From early arcade games through fan-made homebrew titles, you'll learn why passionate Atari fans are loyal for life.

It contains 19 new games:
Atari Video Cube (2600)
Avalanche (800)
Avalanche (arcade)
Berzerk (2600 Voice Enhanced)

Berzerk (5200)

description: Get Call of Duty Points* and in-game content for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare III and Call of Duty: Warzone.

name: Restaurant Cooking Simulator
description: Manage your restaurant in Restaurant Cooking Simulator! Customize your kitchen, cook tasty dishes, serve customers quickly, and upgrade your equipment to grow your business!

name: Resope!
description: Rescue the sushi stuck in the wall! A full-fledged puzzle game that requires a lot of careful thought. All you have to do is ignite the blocks.

name: Spinning Puzzle Compare the Universe
description: Let's learn about space in a fun way with a quiz that rotates images! By comparing photos, you can get to know the universe even better!

name: Rope Hope
description: SWING INTO ACTION!

description: Simulator Specialized in Turns for Cars

name: Monument: Ultimate Edition
description: Old-school first person shooter

name: Zombie Attack: Zombies Survival Shooter
description: Zombie apocalypse action that will keep you on your toes and challenge your survival skills. Your task is to survive and escape!

name: Colorizing: Good Times
description: Coloring by numbers game for relaxation

name: 100 hidden Cats: Kitty House
description: 100 hidden Cats "Kitten House" is a hidden objects/hidden creatures game. The player's task is to find all hundred cats on the map.

name: JeliWave
description: JeliWave is a linear 3D platformer with the visual appearance of retro games from the 90s. Swing your way through various worlds, unlock new abilities and master the art of Jeli's grapple!

name: VHScape
description:
You find yourself trapped in a haunted VHS rental store, can you survive their twisted games and escape?

Description:
VHScape is a short horror-themed walking simulator and memory game inspired by similar anomaly games.

Play Time:
20-90 minutes

name: Looking Up I See Only A Ceiling: The Relapse
description:
After experimenting surreal visions in her ceiling, a stressed student discovers that life is not always a relaxing journey. Exams are not over: reality demands more psychological efforts to overcome new problems.

Enjoy this new story of “Looking Up I See Only A Ceiling” and live the life of a student trying to fight anxiety, stress and overthinking.

name: Umamusume: Pretty Derby - DLC vol. 1: Team Iris
description: Sin descripción

name: BallZ DX
description: Ultimate block breaker with all the bells and whistles

name: Luna-3X
description:
Only seven days remain
to save this planet's creatures and the world.
This is Jonah and Luna's story.

name: 2048 Snake
description: Imagine a mix of classic snake and puzzle game 2048 and there you have a unique gameplay in front of you that you can try right now. Run and grow your snake on different challenging levels and discover new big numbers on the cubes.

name: Against the Storm: Keepers of the Stone
description: As the struggle for survival against the Blightstorm continues, Against the Storm - Keepers of the Stone introduces a new species, a new biome, and a selection of new buildings, orders, risks, and opportunities for any Viceroy up for the challenge. The Frogs join the effort to push back the storm, bringing their skill with stone masonry and love for water with them. Meanwhile, a changing of the tides has unlocked new potential in the distance – the Coastal Groves have finally become accessible after countless cycles spent under the deluge. Though they remain isolated and hard to reach, the ancient, submerged settlements of the area hold great treasures waiting to be uncovered.

name: Worms Armageddon: Anniversary Edition
description: Worms Armageddon: Anniversary Edition is a modern release of the 1999 classic, including cross-generation console online play for up to 6 players.

name: Star Wars: Hunters - Season 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Apartment Story
description: A third-person thriller about three people and a gun in a single apartment. Navigate escalating real-time narrative events whilst managing Sims-esq stats to stay strong for an inevitable showdown. You play as Arthur, a young man trying to make it day to day before a gun turns his life upside down.

name: Dragon Daughter
description: Aurora is a famous healer who lives in a place known as the boathouse and hides a dangerous past that comes back to haunt her. As the last of her kind, Aurora is being hunted and now so is her daughter Alma. To survive, she will need to master her powers and fight for those she loves.

name: Games Advent Calendar 2024
description: Jump on a train packed with gifts and dive into the holiday spirit with Games Advent Calendar 2024!

name: Deep Space 7
description: This is an independent action shooting game with a third person horror atmosphere. Facing the terrifying monsters in the space station, you must overcome the shortage of supplies, solve numerous mysteries, and successfully escape danger

name: Escaping Wonderland
description:
Escaping Wonderland is a new chapter in the Down the Rabbit Hole saga, and an all new story from the same developers who brought you the original, Cortopia Studios

Puzzle your way through perplexing challenges and lose yourself in an enchanting landscape where up is down, left is right, and nothing is quite as it seems (except when it is, and even then, it might not be).

Prepare for hours of gameplay, brimming with brain-teasers, enchantment, and just the right dash of delightful nonsense. Will Molly navigate her way out, or will she unearth the curious truth that sometimes the best way out is further in? Step into this whimsical whirlwind and discover what Molly is really escaping from and help her recover her memory—if you dare!

name: The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom
description:
The people of Hyrule are being stolen away by strange rifts that have appeared, and with a certain swordsman among those missing, it’s up to Princess Zelda to save her kingdom.

Team up with the mysterious fairy, Tri, and use the power of the Tri Rod to learn how to create echoes, imitations of things found in the environment. You can then recreate those echoes whenever you like to solve puzzles and defeat enemies.

Create echoes like water blocks to reach new heights, make bridges out of old beds, throw rocks at foes, or find your own creative combination of echoes to do things your way. You can even create echoes of monsters to fight at your side in combat!

name: Monopoly
description: Monopoly is back with a fresh look and an improved game experience. Buy, sell, trade properties, and grow your empire in this faithful adaptation of the game we all grew up with! Dive into the centre of the board to explore a gorgeous fully animated 3D city.

name: America's Next Top Pornstar
description: You're the newest star on the rise in the world of porn, but you'll have to earn your spot at the top! Use your mouth, hands and a legendary cock to climb the ranks all the way up from a lowly amateur to the very heights of porn stardom. Do you have what it takes to be America's Next Top Pornstar!?

name: Corrupted Hottie
description: An adult visual novel where you seduce and corrupt your new roommate. Slowly influencing her into becoming more rebellious and sexual.

name: Factory Outlet Simulator
description: Factory Outlet Simulator is a very comprehensive clothes manufacturing and selling game. You can produce the products of world famous brands in your factory and sell them. Or you can expand your business and create your own brand. Use your business acumen to lead the market from zero to the top!

name: Cat Rescue Story
description:
It's up to you to create the most welcoming cat rescue centre around! When you move into the house left to you by your great-aunt, all you find is a cardboard box with a stray cat inside, which needs your help. Your mission is to take care of it and rescue other cats along the way! Feed them and play with them until you can find a new family to take them in.

Rescue more than 50 different breeds, from the most common to the rarest. Take care of the cats by feeding them and playing with them in several mini-games. Discover each cat's different personality as you bond with them, and find them a family suitable to their character and needs. Customize, decorate, and furnish your house, and team up with your new neighbors to get them to help along the way. Protect your rescue centre from those seeking to replace it with a luxury hotel. Uncover the secret of your great-aunt's house and the mysterious forest surrounding it.

name: All You Need is Help
description:
Dive into a quirky multiplayer co-op puzzle game where adorable, fluffy cube-shaped creatures collaborate to reach their goals. These creatures, each oddly shaped, jostle against each other to help solve puzzles together. When in trouble, shout "HELP!" and friends will surely come to your aid. With everyone's strength, turn friendships into friend-shapes!

The game's intuitive, straightforward controls mean that anyone can jump right in. You'll control creatures that are shaped differently as you progress through each level, to clear challenges. Although these creatures can move around freely, they cannot rotate, necessitating the need for teamwork to solve the puzzles. Join forces to overcome obstacles and reach your goals together!

name: Rogue Citadel
description: Unlock new defences, collect powerful items and create game-breaking synergies in this roguelite tower defence survivors game.

name: The Lust City 2
description: Embark on an exotic quest in "The Lust City 2"! Lead your crew through a steamy jungle, unlocking treasures and secrets of an ancient tribe. Craft your seductive harem in a thrilling adventure that will leave you breathless. Explore the lustful depths of the jungle – where danger meets desire!

name: 63 Days
description: A real-time tactics game from Destructive Creations taking place during WWII. The capital city of Poland, Warsaw, is under occupation of German forces, however there are groups of fearless people who are not afraid to face the enemy. 63 Days follows the steps of their previous game War Mongrels to deliver a Commandos-like game play set in the darkest days of human history.

name: Exographer
description: Exographer is an exploration game based on science. Become an explorer, stranded in an alien planetoid, and discover the secrets of an extinct civilization. Gain new powers to avoid dangers and obstacles in your journey, and use your camera to reveal particles and hidden clues.

name: Golden Lap
description: Step into the polished shoes of a racing team manager in the heart-stirring Golden Era of motorsport where every decision can lead to glory or gravel. With sleek minimalist charm and deep strategic gameplay, Golden Lap offers a unique experience in the motorsport management genre.

name: Metal: Hellsinger VR
description: Slay to the beat as the award-winning score of Metal: Hellsinger VR thunders through your body. Experience the smash-hit rhythm FPS like never before and enter a state of unparallelled flow. Show the Hells the meaning of metal.

name: Book of Hours: House of Light
description: A story-focused expansion for narrative crafting RPG BOOK OF HOURS. Explore visitors and their stories in much greater depth. Host exotic feasts and sophisticated soirées. And in your own quiet way, shape the genesis of the controversial Lighthouse Institute.

name: Starship Home
description: Traverse the galaxy in a starship bound for discovery! Prepare your living room for lift off as you depart on a cozy interplanetary expedition to collect, nurture, and befriend plants from around the galaxy. Immerse yourself in the mystery of an interstellar crisis from the comfort of your own home.

name: Cheddar Beach: Episode 0
description: Take a trip to Cheddar Beach in this interactive visual novel! Join Hamston & The Homies as they search for a crackin’ house party on a Friday night, in a world inspired by LA in the early 90’s. Let’s Chase That Cheese, Ya’ll!

name: La Llorona Wants Your Soul
description: La Llorona wants your soul offers a unique horror experience based on real events that occurred in Mexico, follw the tormented soul of a woman who lost her children and every night roams the town in search of them and the one who took them. In this story, you control a group of 4 paranormal investigators seeking to solve the mystery and find La Llorona's children to free the pain of the restless soul.

name: Survival Story
description: Survival Story is a unique immersion into the world of survival, where every step is a struggle for life. In this exciting game you have to survive in an apocalyptic world where dangers await at every corner, from hunger and thirst to the invasion of the creepy walking dead.

name: Night Slashers: Remake
description: Night Slashers is a pulse-pounding, horror-themed beat 'em up game, in a nightmarish world filled with bloodthirsty creatures and unspeakable horrors.

name: Pineapple: A Bittersweet Revenge
description: Pineapple is a puzzle and story-revenge-driven game where you become the hero of the school by pulling pranks on the top bully. Time to give that witch a taste of their own medicine. With a pineapple.

name: Coin-Op Vice
description: Survive in the final battle to save the lost world of 80s arcade halls. Build the best game cartridge deck to purge the mysterious buildings from the hold of hostile entities. Complete levels of legendary arcades to expand your deck.

name: Spy 1 Lovecraftian
description: Teen Romance x Comedy x Lovecraftian. This visual novel is a must-play for fans of all three genres. It features a heartwarming romance, hilarious comedy, and edge-of-your-seat thrill. With its engaging story and memorable characters, this visual novel is sure to leave you wanting more.

name: Zero Protocol
description: In this Sci-Fi survival horror game, you must uncover the secrets of the IAS Antarctic Research Complex and try to survive. You will find various endings, puzzles, battles with monsters, and an intriguing plot.

name: Magic Cauldron: Dungeons
description: Magic Cauldron - Dungeons is a classic dungeon crawler with a pixel art look. The game is reminiscent of the good old days of grid crawlers, which were still completely 3D-free.

name: Treasures of the Sunken Ship
description: A single-player game in which you have to search for treasures and uncover the sinister secrets of the depths of the sea. Explore the mysterious island and discover all the long-buried secrets.

name: Droste Effect
description: Explore the peculiar tale of Droste Effect, a captivating 2D puzzle game. Confront the mysterious past of your new home with Alexandra, uncover secrets, and manage your sanity in an intense adventure. Rediscover the power of memories as you dive into a past that will reshape your present.

name: Bootlegger: Moonshine Empire
description: Make your name as a whiskey-runner, a politician, or a gangster as you quench thirsts from rural Pennsylvania to the New York City nightlife!

name: Crimson wind
description: Stephen, having inherited a sawmill, decides to sell it to fund a documentary about an unpunished murderer from his city. Little did he imagine where this decision would lead.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Kai no Kiseki - Farewell, O Zemuria
description: The Legend of Heroes: Kai no Kiseki - Farewell, O Zemuria is the thirteenth installment in the main Trails series, serving as a direct sequel to the events of The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak II. The game marks the turning point of the series and many of the mysteries of Zemuria.

name: Dragonero
description: Dragonero is an immersive turn-based combat RPG set in a vast and savage fantasy world. Guide the heroes through trap-strewn dungeons, dozens of enemies and embark on your journeys with strategy. Protect the Erondár and defeat the Necromancer!

name: Realm of Ink
description: Realm of Ink is an Ink-style action Roguelite game. You, the heroine unexpectedly discover that you are just a fictional character within the short story collection Realm of Ink when hunting the Fox. Only by defeating the mysterious Book Spirit can you be liberated from the realm.

name: Alruna and the Necro-Industrialists
description: Alruna is a compact and high-density Metroidvania, with a focus on sequence-breaking and playing things out of order.

name: Ghoul Smash
description: Ghoul Smash is a turn based physics game similar to Graffiti Smash and Monster Strike where you smash into enemies, fight bosses, and loot items. With simplistic click-and-drag controls you can experience the thrill of smashing enemies into dust while gaining dopamine fueled rewards!

name: Car Detailing Simulator VR
description: In Car Detailing Simulator VR, you have the power to renew and restore cars to its former glory, catering to the demands of your discerning customers. Transform neglected vehicles into stunning and well-maintained machines that can be the envy of all.

name: Beyond Hanwell
description: Step into Hanwell and discover a world beyond it. Set in the deeper parts of London, explore Westminster and uncover the truth about the enigmatic stranger known as The Director. Fight with whatever you can find or use the environment to take out Anomolies.

name: Mouthwashing
description: The five crew members of The Tulpar are stranded in the empty reaches of space, shrouded in perpetual sunset. God is not watching.

name: G.I. Joe: Wrath of Cobra
description: Yo Joe! Cobra returns once again with its most fiendish plot yet and it's up to G.I. JOE to defeat them once more! Pick one of the real American heroes, gear up, and get straight into the fight in this retro side-scrolling beat 'em up - and make Cobra RETREAT yet again!

name: Pocket Waifu: Rekindled
description: Pocket Waifu: Rekindled is a unique Visual Novel experience with a complex story hiding behind a simple facade. Make a pact with a Succubus, through which a whole bunch of beautiful, sexy ladies will show up at your door! Can you satisfy them all?

name: Red Ops: The First Infection
description: Red Ops: The First Infection is an engaging ​BL/yaoi visual novel (18+) ​featuring hardships, world-ending events, zombies, love and intimacy. Follow our characters as they embrace their sexuality and explore their newfound romance.

name: Choice of Life: Wild Islands
description: Conquer the jungle and prove that in any situation you - the master of your destiny!

name: The Nameless: Slay Dragon
description: The Nameless: Slay Dragon is a gamebook-adventure flavored turn-based RPG In short - how to slay the immensely powerful and cunning evil dragon? You will play as a young man having a bloody feud with a dragon, and face powerful, sinister and tricky enemies with friends....

name: Insane Escape
description: Escape from a randomly generated asylum in this roguelike horror puzzle game. Solve randomly generated puzzles and find items to get the keys to unlock the main door and get out. Avoid the fugitive patients while they try to kill you. The most important puzzle you need to solve is how to survive.

name: Mechabellum
description: Mechabellum is an epic auto-battler taking place on the newly colonized planet of Far-Away. You’re the Commander of an army of mechs fighting it out in massive PvP battles. Customize and level up your units, strategically place them on the battlefield and watch them destroy your enemies.

name: The Holy Gosh Darn
description: The Holy Gosh Darn is a narrative adventure with a time-travelling twist. Time travel to jump between the past and present across Heaven, Hell, Earth and Helheim. Uncover information in one timeline to alter things in another in a bid to stop your universe from going bang. Again.

name: Scribblequest
description: This is not just a game with music in it, it’s like *LITERALLY* a musical... But also a game... You’ll see.

name: Breachway
description: Assemble your crew, load out your ship, and explore the galaxy in this deck-building space roguelike. Your deck is determined by your spaceship's loadout, mix and match equipment to discover different powerful card synergies, and obliterate your enemies in tactical space battles

name: Ravenswatch
description: Fallen heroes of old folk tales and legends: you are on the verge of a crucial battle against the Nightmare invading and corrupting your world. A roguelike action game from the creators of Curse of the Dead Gods, playable solo or in online co-op.

name: Lost In Fantaland
description: Lost In Fantaland is a retro pixel-style roguelite game that blends deck building and turn-based strategies on a checkerboard.

name: Shadows of Doubt
description:
Shadows of Doubt is a detective stealth game set in a fully-simulated neo-noir metropolis.

An open world stealth game with a whole city of secrets at your fingertips!

Set in an alternate reality hyper-industrialized 1980s where the government outsources police work to private corporations and contractors. You play the role of a private intelligence investigator, making money by finding and selling information. Capture of the rampant serial killer carries a hefty bounty, but who knows what secrets you’ll find along the way. In this world of secrets & lies, information is power, and the cards you hold are determined by how far you’ll go to acquire it…

Break into apartments, rifle through secret documents and hack security systems. The entire world is fully simulated. Each citizen has an apartment, a job, a daily routine, favorite things to do, places to go, and people to interact with. Uncover this knowledge and use it to your advantage!

name: Generation Zero: Starter Pack Bundle
description: This bundle includes the most essential weapons and equipment for new Resistance fighters.

name: Generation Zero: Action Hero Bundle
description: Become the ultimate Resistance fighter with the Action Hero Bundle.

name: Jump on the Ball
description:
Try and balance on the ball for more than FIVE seconds! Can you beat all three WHACKY levels?!

Jump on the Ball is the first video game launch from indie studios Literally Nothing and Twitzor Games. What started as an idea for a meme game quickly turned into reality as it became a mission to release a first game, no matter how simple or mundane.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces 2: Additional Puzzle Pack Set Vol.7
description: Sin descripción

name: Headquarters: World War II - Market Garden
description: Headquarters: World War II - Market Garden introduces a new British campaign with 8 meticulously crafted battles covering the events of Operation Market Garden. Your force has to reach the paratroopers holding the key bridges as soon as possible. However, nothing goes according to plan - and your troops have to deal with the ensuing chaos.

name: Dungeon Rummage: Survival
description:
Dungeon Rummage - Survival is a bite-sized, Survival-lite, Turn-based Dungeon crawler with a cozy vibe.

Stranded on a remote island, your only path to escape leads through a dangerous underground dungeon. Dungeon Rummage - Survival is a turn-based dungeon crawler where you gather resources and upgrade your camp to survive.

Explore the depths to collect essential materials. Bring your finds back to camp to enhance your stats, craft potions, and cook meals, all of which are crucial for facing tougher enemies.

Your ultimate goal is to reach the dungeon’s bottom and find your way back home.

name: The Home Into The Woods
description: Trapped in the woods you have no idea who or what is there?

name: Hidden Pass Skirmishes
description: Chart a course for mystical adventure in this fusion of Tactical Turn-Based RPG and Strategy. This is a small tactical adventure where you have to choose one of four groups of heroes and challenge three different groups of opponents. Starting with an easy group of enemies and ending with strong one.

name: Arcane Quest 4
description:
The galaxy is under siege as OmniCorp threatens to dominate every planet and harvest the precious Arcane Stones that power advanced machines and weapons.
Unite with heroes from across the universe to form the Galactic Alliance and stand against this formidable enemy in this epic turn-based RPG adventure.

name: Twelve Sticks
description: Play hide-and-seek with friends online, hide from the monster, or play as a monster and catch other players. Get scared, have fun, collect points, buy upgrades, and most importantly, have fun.

name: The Land of Fog
description: Game type: turn based strategy action bar mode Rich plot, diverse skills, players play as several mercenaries, use strategies to challenge various levels, gradually unravel the fog of the Mist Continent, and complete their legends

name: Juuni-ban-me ni Warui Yume no Sachi
description:
Juuni-ban-me ni Warui Yume no Sachi is a 2D action game with hand-drawn characters.
Explore the wonderful world to collect sheep.

name: Cat in Rain
description: Sin descripción

name: Ducky Dash
description: Ducky Dash is a tribute to classic handheld games, featuring a charming green monochromatic palette and a retro soundtrack that evokes nostalgia. Embark on an exciting journey with a fearless little duck, using your Dash skills to overcome obstacles and explore vibrant worlds.

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.2 - Tour de Inferno
description:
Version 1.2 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:

• New Characters: Caesar and Burnice
• New Main Story Quest: Chapter 4 - Tour de Inferno
• New Events
• ...and more!

name: The Report: The Eastwind Creature
description: A road traveler heads into Eastwind in search of a creature from a local legend to do a report.

name: The Turnabout that Shouldn't Exist
description: If you woke up in a world that no longer needed you, what would you do? What would you make of yourself in a time where you no longer exist...?

name: Laser Fortress
description: Sin descripción

name: Vollemental
description: Sin descripción

name: Tsuneko Apple
description:
Tsuneko, a tortoiseshell cat, will grow up collecting apples.
When you see the game clear text somewhere, the game is clear!

name: Toucan Adventure: Rio de Janeiro
description: In a vibrant rainforest, Tito, a young toucan, feels different and apart from the rest of the animals.

name: Scattered Thoughts
description: Twelve sleepy speedmaps made in three hours or less by The Afternoon Crew, led by @finnks13. Between larger projects, we want to make these smaller, easier affairs. We hope you have fun.

name: Lost Island of Jungata
description: This is a 7 map episode for Doom 2 for use with GZDoom that features several new weapons, new enemies, new textures and new music. This wad is very loosely based on an island Lizardcommando made for an unreleased RPG Maker 2003 game and a really old unreleased Doom 2 map from many years ago. Also loosely based on their "Make a Good Mega Man Level 3" submission called Lost Caverns of Jungata.

name: Leapventure: Countless Biomes
description: Test your skills in this obstacle-packed platformer! Dodge enemies, avoid the lava, and aim for the highest score!

name: Borrowhelen
description: Borrowhelen is a 90s-style first-person shooter set in a fantastical realm like no other. As the brilliant scientist Ordin Gilbellt, you dive into battle against cultists and mythical creatures, wielding powerful and unique weapons.

name: Zombie Overdrive
description: Three driving game modes. Survive zombies, kill them or finish a race in the shortest time possible.

name: Squad: Weapon Skins - Contractors Pack
description: This pack contains 8 weapon skins for use with the WPMC faction.

name: Poly Plaza: Farmer Pack
description: Unlock 3 new vehicles and 6 new clothes for Poly Plaza with this awesome Farmer Pack!

name: Idle Champions: Plushie BBEG Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion BBEG (if you don't already own them) Plushie BBEG Skin An Epic Feat for BBEG 7 Gold BBEG Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Idle Champions: Warforged Colossus Familiar Pack
description: In this pack: Warforged Colossus Familiar 6 Epic Potions of Speed 6 Epic Potions of Giant's Strength 6 Epic Potions of Clairvoyance 6 Epic Potions of Fire Breath 1 Epic Potion of the Gold Hunter 2000 Modron Component Pieces 1 Potion of Polish

name: Idle Champions: Chibi Gale Skin & Feat Pack
description: In this pack: Unlocks the Champion Gale (if you don't already own them) Chibi Gale Skin An Epic Feat for Gale 7 Gold Gale Chests 1 Guaranteed Shiny Equipment Card 6 Epic Blacksmithing Contracts 6 Epic Bounty Contracts

name: Unrooted
description: You were sent in a problematic area to soothe the earth, using rudimentary equipment you are tasked with destroying the machines hurting the environment and help the area by putting down fire, get rid of pollution and soothing the trees.

name: XDefiant: Season 2 - Highwayman
description: Cause chaos as the Highwaymen and check out new weapons, maps, and the much-anticipated Bomb mode!

name: Celebrating Popcorn
description: This interactive Doodle game celebrates popcorn. Click the Doodle to compete against players around the world with one goal... don't get popped!

name: Battleship
description:
Sink or be sunk! Deploy smart tactics and a powerful arsenal to bring down your opponent's hidden fleet in this classic guessing game.

Make every guess count in this timeless, turn-based strategy game of nautical cat and mouse. Arrange your ships on the grid and engage in thrilling naval battles with players around the globe to see who can locate and sink the other's fleet first.

A lineup of special weapons adds new tactical depth, while customizable ship skins, player avatars and more let you take command of your game. Full speed ahead — your legend awaits!

name: Jalecolle Famicom Ver. Bio Warrior Dan: The Increaser War
description: JALECOlle Famicom Ver. continues with back-to-back releases of Jaleco's Famicom titles! The third installment is Bio Warrior DAN The Increaser War!

name: Escape From Island
description: After a helicopter crash on a mysterious island, your mission is to survive and escape before the island's dark forces consume you. Explore, gather resources, and face dangerous enemies as you navigate the island's open world. Can you escape before it's too late?

name: Decidit
description: Decidit is a fast FPS roguelike in which you must use all the arsenal and movement abilities at your disposal in order to progress in an unstable demonic maze. Be fast, precise but also strategic using all the demonic weapons and abilities collected on the way to create powerful synergies.

name: Din's Champion
description: Mine and gather resources, craft useful items, and explore a dynamic, evolving world all while fighting off the evil gods' minions and machinations in this side scrolling, action RPG. Become a Din's Champion and stop Valta's new scheme to destroy the world. Oh, and beware of exploding barrels...

name: ZombFarm
description: Engage in rewarding life sim elements and farming mini games while avoiding the undead that roam the nearby woods!

name: Square of Joy
description: Climb up, reach the top, using nothing but your skill and will. Compete with steam friends and players from all over the world. Discover secrets along the way.

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: Silver Sharp Pack
description: The Sharps Silver pack includes: - Jaguar F-Type SVR Coupe - Audi R8 Spyder V10 RWS - Baron of the Sharps outfit for your avatar - Sharps sticker pack for customizing your cars

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: DLC Solar Content
description:
The Solar Content pack includes:
- Maserati MC20
- Chevrolet Camaro ZL1 1LE
- Board Committee Member outfit for your avatar
- Solar Crown sticker pack for customizing your cars

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: Silver Street Pack
description: The Streets Silver pack includes: - Land Rover Range Rover Sport SVR - Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG - Lord of the Streets outfit for your avatar - Streets sticker pack for customizing your cars

name: Test Drive Unlimited Solar Crown: Ford GT 2006
description: Inspired by the famous 1960s Ford GT40, the 2006 Ford GT pays tribute to the four-time winner of the 24 Hours of Le Mans. The design of this prestigious and high-performance car is reminiscent of its predecessor.

name: Bean There Won That
description: A physics driven party game designed to tests your friendships! Engage in a variety of crazy minigames as you shoot, boot and bash your way up to the top of the scoreboard! Online or splitscreen, you can crush your friends worldwide.

name: The Polar Explorer: Hokkyoku he no VR Soriasobi
description: This is a VR adventure type game in which you play as a brave pilot who drives a sleigh through a world full of icebergs and snow on a polar expedition.

name: Mind of War
description:
Turn-based strategy game that immerses you in an epic fantasy world, with a variety of clashes to test your cunning and wits.

As you progress through the game, you unlock new units and abilities, as well as improving their combat capabilities, allowing you to face new challenges and try new tactics. There are a variety of factions, each with their own particular style of combat, and each with a large repertoire of units, from basic infantry, heroes, giant creatures, menacing war machines and, of course, magical entities.

Each battle is a challenge, an opposing array to defeat, forcing you to decide which units to use, what skills and abilities you will need, and once the battle is underway, how to move between blows to achieve victory.

name: Battleships and Carriers 2
description: Casual WW2 naval turn-based strategy: attack/defend, search & destroy, build ships, subs and aircraft. Clear and simple combat and move. Fast, re-playable board game style strategy, with 70 unit types. Different missions/campaign objectives (Destroy, Conquer, Defend, Escort, Kill-Them-All).

name: 9th Dawn Remake
description: Rediscover the magic of the 9th Dawn series with this complete re-imagining of the original game. Venture into a massive 2.5D open world. Explore 45 new dungeons in top-down or first-person view, craft weapons, raise pets, play a deck-building card game, and take down the Castle of Maltyr!

name: Duckside
description: Imagine DayZ or Rust but you're a duck. A persistent world survival game with PVP, PVE, crafting, base building and hat wearing ducks, wielding weapons.

name: I'll be Brave, Tomorrow
description: A first-person narrative adventure game, telling the story of a sick child playing a 2D platformer. This game is in support of Great Ormond Street Hospital Charity!

name: Deep Among the Swarm
description: Deep Among the Swarm is a challenging survival RTS roguelite about surviving against thousands of enemies. Drill ever deeper underground while fighting the endless onslaught of the Swarm. Can you save humanity?

name: Xialuo: Kill All Flowers
description: Xialuo: Kill All Flowers is an innovative turn based adventure RPG that combines the commonly used "dice elements" and "big map exploration" in board games. In the game, you will gradually uncover various monsters in this dark and mysterious world, achieve your mission.

name: Neongarten
description: Neongarten is a minimalist cyberpunk city builder where you build from the ground up! Find synergies between buildings to maximize taxes, pit mega-corps against illegal hackers, and place toxic waste dumps over coffee shops. Chill out to lo-fi tunes while your city block grows one cube at a time.

name: Dorei Same
description: An erotic top-down adventure game about a woman who lost everything and now has to adjust to her new life as a slave for a noble's daughter. Explore the castle and figure out a way to escape the lustful maiden.

name: SysOps Saga
description: SysOps Saga is a simulation game that puts you in the shoes of a Site Reliability Engineer (SRE), managing the intricate web of software, security, and hardware to keep digital systems running. Developed by a FAANG veteran, this game offers an immersive and educational experience for IT enthusiasts.

name: #Drive Rally
description: Drive Rally lets you relive the 90s in the most exciting era in motorsport history, where dust, mud, and snow are badges of honor. Unleash the raw power of legendary rally beasts, admire every second of the stunning landscapes, and remember: the faster you go, the better!

name: Skies Above
description: When the last Leviathan begins its dangerous escape from the planet, as the leader of a small warrior group, it's your turn to protect it from the robot army of the greedy mega-corporation.

name: Dawn of Insolence
description: A top-down roguelike with a deck-building system. Create your own unique deck of weapons, passive items and other upgrades. Each time you level up, you will be given random upgrades from your deck. Unlock new upgrade options to personalize your deck and survive the hordes of enemies.

name: Algor Pew Pew
description: One day, invaders from the other world attacked and kidnapped all ARPs. Your mission is to travel through parallel worlds, enjoy the rhythms, rescue the ARPs and survive until end. Let us dive you into the first rogue-lite survival game from Algorhythm Project.

name: Balling Up
description: Immerse yourself in a colorful journey through universes that does not forgive any mistakes. Jump well in the ball parkour game, where falling can cost you everything!

name: Keepers of Astraela
description: A dark fantasy otome visual novel that follows a writer whose characters come to life. Join Eva as she fights against forces of Darkness, flirts with a fiery man, and consumes all the coffee she can find.

name: Super Words
description: Super Words is a reversed crossword puzzle & word game. You need to place and connect all words on the board according to the given clues

name: InRun
description: Experience the magic of classic arcade racing with an innovative open-world multiplayer system and optional Virtual Reality support that, for the first time in a driving game, produces no motion sickness.

name: Dungeon Tycoon
description: Build your own dungeon and attract heroes from all across the realm! Grow your business by capitalizing on every aspect of your visitor's dungeon-crawling experience. Will you be able to keep your evil business afloat?

name: An Everyday Story
description: An Everyday Story is a story-driven puzzle platformer with a heartfelt twist. Experience a life from the view of three trinkets... what do you think happens when our dreams become so real that they stain our reality?

name: Fairy Village
description: Meet the thumblings! They are teeny magical folk wandering the land in search of a home. Help them wander no more! Deep inside Fae Forest, a perfect oasis has presented itself, it's time to settle and make roots!

name: Outland Kingdoms
description: Colony building RPG with fully simulated living AI, driven by procedurally generated Stories. Build a hut, a village, a town, a city, a kingdom. 5 different races. Ally with unique factions. Rule an Undead empire. Craft Legendary items. Tame creatures. Enslave enemies. Raise dragons. It's all here.

name: Elemgate
description: Roll through 2.5-D stages while controlling your speed and switching elements to hit gates, activate ramps, enter portals or reverse and restore gravity with the correct element to get more time that converts into score that you will need to pass levels, earn stars and find a way to escape.

name: Murder on Space Station 52
description: Trapped on a space station with a ruthless killer, Edward Locke must solve this mystery, or it will be his last. In this strange place, filled with even stranger people, Edward will discover more about himself than he ever could have imagined.

name: Cat Nips
description: Cat Nips is a game about a cat eating people to escape an office. This cat will need to sneak past guards, cameras and other dangers in order to escape.

name: Extraneum
description: Fight your way through mutated fiends and stop their progress in this old school FPS

name: Squad: Canadian Armed Forces
description: A new battlefield for SquadThe Canadian Armed Forces DLC is free for all owners of Squad and is an all new faction developed by community members together with Offworld Industries. Featuring two new maps on the North American continent, three new vehicles and completely custom and hand crafted character models it will add a complete new...
